headline: LYB & Nippon Team Up for Recycling Coating Packaging Barrels
summary: LYB and Nippon Paint launch a recycling loop for coating barrels in China, turning used plastics into new packaging.

headline: LyondellBasell: A 12% Dividend Yield Is A Sign That Someone Is Being Irrational
summary: LyondellBasell stock has fallen nearly 50% with a dividend yield above 12% and potential for sustainability. Check out why LYB stock is a buy.
